Description: For when being a good sport is too hard.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Send Game Over Message
CheckboxSettings.Description: Whether or not the game over message will be sent.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Send Game Start Message
CheckboxSettings.Description: Whether or not the game start message will be sent.

TextInputSettings.Name: Game Over Message
TextInputSettings.Description: This is the message that will automatically be sent when a game ends. '%faction%' will be replaced with the winning faction. '%faction%' will be replaced with the winning faction. '%role%' will be replaced with your role.

TextInputSettings.Name: Won Game Message
TextInputSettings.Description: This is the message that will automatically be sent when a game ends if you win. Overrides the 'Game Over Message' setting if set. '%faction%' will be replaced with the winning faction. '%role%' will be replaced with your role.

TextInputSettings.Name: Lost Game Message
TextInputSettings.Description: This is the message that will automatically be sent when a game ends if you lose. Overrides the 'Game Over Message' setting if set. '%faction%' will be replaced with the winning faction. '%role%' will be replaced with your role.

TextInputSettings.Name: Drawn Game Message
TextInputSettings.Description: This is the message that will automatically be sent when a game ends if no one wins. Overrides the 'Game Over Message' setting if set. '%role%' will be replaced with your role.

TextInputSettings.Name: Game Start Message
TextInputSettings.Description: This is the message that will automatically be sent once the first day begins.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Auto Choose Name Delay
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The delay (in seconds) after which it will automatically send your name in the pick names phase. Set to 0 to disable. Maximum 10.
